import React from"react";import BookCard from"./BookCard";var BookList=function BookList(props){var count=0;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"list"},props.books.map(function(book,i){var available=false;var today=new Date();var dd=String(today.getDate()).padStart(2,"0");var mm=String(today.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,"0");//January is 0!
var yyyy=today.getFullYear();today=yyyy+"-"+mm+"-"+dd;console.log(today);if(book.volumeInfo.publishedDate.substring(0,4)===today.substring(0,4)){if(book.volumeInfo.publishedDate.length===4){available=true;}else if(book.volumeInfo.publishedDate.substring(5,7)===today.substring(5,7)){available=parseInt(today.substring(8,10))-parseInt(book.volumeInfo.publishedDate.substring(8,10));}else{available=parseInt(today.substring(5,7))-parseInt(book.volumeInfo.publishedDate.substring(5,7));}}else{available=parseInt(today.substring(0,4))-parseInt(book.volumeInfo.publishedDate.substring(0,4));}console.log(available);if(count>2||available<0){}else{count++;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BookCard,{key:i,image:book.volumeInfo.imageLinks.thumbnail,title:book.volumeInfo.title,published:book.volumeInfo.publishedDate,author:book.volumeInfo.authors});}}));};export default BookList;/*
